stories.text:
Please state the location and include REMOTE, INTERNS and/or VISA when that sort of candidate is welcome. When remote work is not an option, include ONSITE.

Please only post if you personally are part of the hiring companyâ€”no recruiting firms or job boards. Only one post per company. If it isn't a household name, please explain what your company does.

Commenters: please don't reply to job posts to complain about something. It's off topic here.

Readers: please only email if you are personally interested in the job.

Searchers: try https://kennytilton.github.io/whoishiring/, https://hnhired.com/, https://hnjobs.emilburzo.com, https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=10313519.
stories.title: Ask HN: Who is hiring? (May 2022)
ViteShot: Generate screenshots of UI components within seconds

Show HN: Listen to your PDFs, e-books and documents with this app I made
Practical bruteforce of military grade AES-1024

stories.text:
I realize optical drives slowly went out of existence as USB flash drives become larger, faster, cheaper.

It was still around for some time, and I would run into them every once in a while.

But today I realized it has been about 5 years since I saw a CD drive on a laptop.

Anyone else?
stories.title: When was the last time you saw a laptop with a CD drive?
Musk told banks he will rein in Twitter pay, make money from tweets
